title: Sofia Vergara cradles beloved pooch Baguette as she steps out in LA in sweater and distressed jeans
text:
Her sitcom Modern Family is coming to an end after 11 seasons on ABC.

And on Wednesday, Sofia Vergara was spotted running some errands in Los Angeles.

The actress, 47, was accompanied by her precious pooch Baguette on whom she dotes.

Pals: Sofia Vergara was spotted running errands in Los Angeles on Wednesday in a black sweater and distressed blue jeans accompanied by her dog Baguette on whom she dotes

Vergara carried the Chihuahua, that has its own Instagram page, as she exited a building and headed to her car.

The Colombian-born star was dressed simply in a black sweater and distressed blue jeans.

She added sparkle, though, with embellished silver sandal heels and ornate sunglasses.

Her long brunette hair was loose and she carried a large brown tote over one shoulder.

Star: The actress, 47, added sparkle with embellished silver sandal heels and ornate sunglasses. Her long brunette hair was loose and she carried a brown tote over one shoulder

It's over: Vergara became a household name after being cast on ABC's Modern Family which is now coming to an end after 11 seasons. She's pictured with her co-stars

Vergara, who started out as a co-host for shows on Spanish language network Univision in the late 1990s, is now the highest-paid actress on American television.

Her big break came in 2009 when she was cast in Modern Family that became a prime time hit.

With that came a string of high-profile product endorsements.

She's been married since 2015 to actor Joe Manganiello, 42, and has an adult son Manolo, 27, from her first marriage to her high-school sweetheart.
description: Vergara carried the Chihuahua, that has its own Instagram page, as she exited a building and headed to her car.
